Class TouchItem

A TouchItem object representing an identifier to track a serial of touch events and location in (x,y) coordinate space of current event.

Constructors

constructor

  • new TouchItem(identifier: number, srcElement?: XObject, stageX?: number, stageY?: number, x?: number, y?: number): TouchItem
    • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:32

    Constructs and initializes a TouchItem at the specified identifier and (x,y) location in the coordinate space.

    Parameters

    • identifier: number

      the identifier of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • Optional srcElement: XObject

      the source element of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • Optional stageX: number
    • Optional stageY: number
    • Optional x: number

      the X coordinate of the newly constructed TouchItem

    • Optional y: number

      the Y coordinate of the newly constructed TouchItem

    Returns TouchItem

Properties

identifier

identifier: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:11

The identifier of this TouchItem, used to track a serial of touch events.

Optional srcElement

srcElement: XObject
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:32

The first pressed element of this event.

stageX

stageX: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:15

The X coordinate of this TouchItem in the stage.

stageY

stageY: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:19

The Y coordinate of this TouchItem in the stage.

x

x: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:23

The X coordinate of this TouchItem in the current element.

y

y: number
  • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:27

The Y coordinate of this TouchItem in the current element.

clone

  • clone(): TouchItem
    • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:80

    Creates a new TouchItem with the same location as this object.

    Returns TouchItem

    a clone of this instance.

equals

  • equals(that: TouchItem): boolean
    • Defined in components/TouchItem.ts:65

    Checks whether two TouchItems are equal. The result is true if and only if the argument is a TouchItem object that has same identifier and location.

    Parameters

    • that: TouchItem

      the Object to compare with this TouchItem.

    Returns boolean

    true if the objects are equal; false otherwise.
